item.title: Persona 5 Tactica
item.description: Join the Phantom Thieves as they lead an uprising of the heart! Assemble an all-star team of heroes in a brand-new story in this thrilling combat adventure set in Persona’s iconic universe.

item.title: An Arcade Full of Cats
item.description: Journey through gaming history's time and space, while searching for adorable feline companions in 'An Arcade Full of Cats,' the ultimate pet'em up hidden object game.

item.title: Backpack Hero
item.description: The inventory management roguelike! Collect rare items, organize your backpack, and vanquish your foes!

item.title: Coral Island
item.description: Coral Island is a vibrant and laid-back reimagining of farm sim games. Be who you want and experience enchanting island living at your own pace—live off the land, nurture animals, build relationships with a diverse cast of townsfolk, and make the world around you a more vital and harmonious place.

item.title: Pirate Fighting Simulator
item.description: Pirate Fighting Simulator is a free multiplayer PVP game developed in UE5 in which you fight other players using typical pirate weaponry.

item.title: Vegas Infinite by PokerStars
item.description: PokerStars presents Vegas Infinite, a world of entertainment with no limits. Leap into VR or PC with no headset required! Take on the house at blackjack and roulette. Light up the dice at craps. Play dazzling slots and challenge real players at authentic poker. Your seat is open.

item.title: Gatekeeper: Infinity
item.description: Prologue version of the game Gatekeeper. Gatekeeper: Infinity is a fast-paced rogue-lite shooter where you'll search for the stolen Heart of the Universe and battle machine enemies! Play solo or join forces with friends in co-op mode.

item.title: Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® III
item.description: In the direct sequel to the record-breaking Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® II, Captain Price and Task Force 141 face off against the ultimate threat.

item.title: I Wanna Maker
item.description: I Wanna Maker is a precision platformer with a robust level editor and online level sharing, based on I Wanna Be The Guy fangames. Create complex levels using a variety of objects, a powerful events system, and customizable visuals. Browse levels online, take on challenge modes, and more!

item.title: Risk of Rain Returns
item.description: Carefully designed, beautifully remastered, and loaded with new ways to play—Risk of Rain is back and better than ever! Dive into the iconic roguelike full of unique loot combinations, enhanced with new Survivors, overhauled multiplayer, fan favorite content from Risk of Rain 2, and more!

item.title: Roboquest
item.description: Roboquest is a fast FPS Roguelite in a scorched futureworld. You're a rebooted Guardian, ready to kick some metal ass! Fight with your buddy or by yourself and annihilate hordes of deadly bots in ever-changing environments.

item.title: Watermelon Game
item.description: A Casual Physics Puzzle game, where you have to combine matching Fruits to get Points and increase your Highscore.

item.title: Football Manager 2024
item.description: Build a world-class team ready to dominate your rivals in football’s most prestigious competitions. Progress never stops when you’re pursuing footballing greatness.

item.title: Cards and Castles 2
item.description: Collectible cards spring to life in this wacky Tactical CCG. Assemble a deck to challenge your friends and rivals, and engage in glorious CARD BATTLES! Will you choose fearsome dragons, or the deadly squirrels?

item.title: RoboCop: Rogue City
item.description: Become the legendary part man, part machine, all cop hero and deliver justice in Old Detroit.

item.title: STAR OCEAN THE SECOND STORY R
item.description: In this science fantasy RPG, choose between Claude or Rena, play through their perspectives, and unlock various endings. Recruit allies and defeat foes in fast paced real-time battles.

item.title: The Talos Principle 2
item.description: The Talos Principle 2 is a thought-provoking first-person puzzle experience that greatly expands on the first game's philosophical themes and stunning environments with increasingly mind-bending challenges.

item.title: My Time at Sandrock
item.description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

item.title: Planet S
item.description: Planet S is a real-time strategy game where your goal is to colonize multiple planets in a solar system to advance your civilization, build a city and supply it to grow your faction.

item.title: Ghostrunner 2
item.description: Blood will run in Ghostrunner 2, a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic cyberpunk future. Become the ultimate cyber ninja and prepare for epic boss fights, improved skills, an interactive story, new game modes, and captivating synthwave soundtrack.

item.title: Slay the Princess
item.description: You're here to slay the princess. Don't believe her lies.

item.title: TELEFORUM
item.description: TELEFORUM is a found-footage-styled horror game exploring the unknown side of media. You’re visiting a widow’s apartment to conduct an interview about her husband's death. But that’s not the main reason why you’re here. It’s all about the tape, isn’t it?

item.title: Infection Free Zone – Prologue
item.description: Experience the first 8 days of the Zone in the Prologue to the widely anticipated post-apocalyptic city-builder game. Lead the survivors, rebuild the city, and fight against the deadly hordes of the infected. Play on 6 different real cities from around the world.

item.title: Diablo® IV
item.description: Join the fight for Sanctuary in Diablo IV, the ultimate action RPG adventure. Experience the critically acclaimed campaign and new seasonal content.

item.title: Wizard with a Gun
item.description: Wizard with a Gun is an online sandbox survival game for 1 - 2 players set in a magical wilderness wrought with dangerous creatures and arcane mysteries. Embark on a journey alone or with a friend to collect, craft, and outfit your wizard however you see fit as you explore the unknown.

item.title: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2
item.description: Play the fully-remastered Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 2 games in one epic collection, rebuilt from the ground up in incredible HD.

item.title: COCOON
item.description: From Jeppe Carlsen, the lead gameplay designer of LIMBO and INSIDE — COCOON takes you on an adventure across worlds within worlds. Master world-leaping mechanics and solve intricate puzzles to unravel a cosmic mystery.

item.title: Moonring
item.description: A dark-fantasy, turn-based, retro-fusion of classic turn-based RPGs and roguelikes, all presented with a unique neon aesthetic.

item.title: Train Sim World® 4
item.description: Feel the power of simulation in your hands. Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4! Expand your rail hobby and discover the raw emotion of driving a diverse array of iconic routes and trains. From training center to mountain pass, this is your journey.

item.title: WitchSpring R
item.description: WitchSpring R is a story-driven RPG combining elements of collecting, simulation, and battling. Experience the joy of training a young witch and accompany her on a grand adventure!

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
item.description: Nicio descriere disponibilă

item.title: Demonologist
item.description: Demonologist is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. Your goal is to identify the type of evil spirit in cursed places and exorcise it using your equipment, either alone or with your team.

item.title: Farlight 84
item.description: Fast-Paced Hero shooter Battle Royale. Multi-platform interoperable. With flexible jetpacks, diverse hero skills, armed vehicles, a special in-game growth system and multiple revives, Farlight 84 brings you quicker battles with more compact mayhem and rampage! Your Farlight, Your Highlight!

item.title: Moonstone Island
item.description: Moonstone Island is a creature-collecting life-sim set in an open world with 100 islands to explore. Make friends, brew potions, collect Spirits, and test your strength in card-based encounters to complete your Alchemy training!

item.title: Party Animals
item.description: Fight your friends as puppies, kittens and other fuzzy creatures in PARTY ANIMALS! Paw it out with your friends remotely, or huddle together for chaotic fun on the same screen. Interact with the world under our realistic physics engine. Did I mention PUPPIES?

item.title: Lies of P
item.description: Lies of P is a thrilling soulslike that takes the story of Pinocchio, turns it on its head, and sets it against the darkly elegant backdrop of the Belle Epoque era.

item.title: SKD
item.description: Crazy 2d-soulslike with stylish characters and sick combat in a furry anime world.

item.title: Electoral Dynasty
item.description: A political-simulation watch-the-clock strategy game. Pass laws, executive orders, and deal with events, all while maintaining the balance of your nation's most important attributes. Will you manage to keep your coalition together or establish a dictatorship? Only you can decide, Prime Minister.

item.title: Deep Blue Odyssey
item.description: Deep Blue Odyssey is a thrilling submarine running game that will test your reflexes and challenge your strategic thinking.

item.title: Steel Thunder
item.description: Steel Thunder is an action-packed runner where you play as a knight and race through a castle while jumping and dodging obstacles to collect coins. The game is an exciting adventure that requires quick reflexes and strategic thinking to conquer each level.

item.title: Chain Ninja
item.description: Chain Ninja is an exciting action-adventure game designed and developed by an experienced game development team. In the game, players need to play a chain ninja, traverse the entire room by hanging ropes in the air, obtain keys, and avoid various obstacles and traps in the level.

item.title: Eternal Roadster
item.description: Eternal Roadsteris an exciting and challenging game that will test your driving skills and reflexes. In this game, you'll be controlling a high-speed race car as it speeds down a never-ending road, constantly changing direction to avoid falling off and failing the game.

item.title: Vertex Rush
item.description: Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

item.title: Cowpocalypse
item.description: An arcade style game, abduct cows to increase your score!

item.title: Joker Show - Horror Escape
item.description: Your parents left for the night, and you stayed at home alone, you were bored and you decided to call the Jester (Joker), but something went wrong... It looks like you succeeded, now the jester wants to play with you, hide and don't let him catch you, find a way to call the jester away.

item.title: Obby
item.description: run, jump, puzzle. Your tasks that you have to master in Obby with Kitty.

item.title: Pizza Delivery [zebaxx]
item.description: You are a young Spanish woman who has just moved to the outskirts of Venice, and has just found a job in a newly opened pizzeria...

item.title: Astrominer
item.description: Embark on an epic space adventure in AstroMiner, where you must build a base, overcome challenges, and construct a space ship to return home from the asteroid belt.

item.title: Mad Jyacer
item.description: Bring healthy food to the finish line. Help your family lose weight!

item.title: Legend of Egypt - Jewels of the Gods
item.description: Thabit mercilessly rules his kingdom in the land of Egypt, until one day he is struck by a heavy blow of fate. The gods Isis and Osiris take pity on the young pharaoh: by building a magnificent city that offers shelter to many contented inhabitants, Thabit can change his fate.

item.title: Nordland Mahjongg
item.description: "Nordland Mahjongg" offers many hours of challenging gaming fun for both beginners and passionate Mahjongg players. Enjoy different, hand-drawn tiles sets that can be coordinated with beautiful backgrounds.

item.title: Jewel Legends: Tree of Life
item.description: The Hods, magical beings and pure of heart, once lived in harmony with the holy Tree of Life. But the endless greed of a dark demon forced the Hods into hiding. Now, new hope springs eternal. In this Match-3 Game you have too restore the Tree of Life and rebuild the world of the Hods!

item.title: Big D Randy
item.description: Randy is not playing around.. Collect all candy's on huge map and don't get caught!

item.title: CyVenge
item.description: CyVenge is a fast paced and action packed rougelite arena shooter. Choose from many upgradable weapons and abilities and help Cy fight against numerous waves of enemies!

item.title: i am a fish Online
item.description: This is a multiplayer online RPG simulation survival game. You can chat casually, socialize and make friends, collect adventures, and obtain various achievements. Become a hero from a small fish. Fight bosses together. Keep your hunger, happiness, sleep, and unlock more fish. Like character, thanks.

item.title: Coffee Brakes
item.description: Battle your friends in an office chair joust to the death! Only one of you can be employee of the month, so battle your friends in a variety of game modes and levels. Get on your office chairs and take your Coffee Brake! Coffee Brakes is a 3rd year project developed at Media Design School

item.title: Retro Commander
item.description: Retro Commander is a post-apocalyptic real-time strategy wargame (RTS).

item.title: NBody Gravitation
item.description: Place asteroids and planets and send them orbiting into targets in a physics-based puzzle game where everything attracts everything.

item.title: Spooky Spins Returns : Crazy Cash Edition - Slots
item.description: Spooky Spins Returns : Crazy Cash Edition is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Horror theme oriented from left to right. - WITH THE SIMILAR LIGHTNING STRIKE FEATURE.

item.title: Wonderland
item.description: Dive into fear in Wonderland, a first-person horror game where you navigate an abandoned mansion, solving puzzles and uncovering mysteries. Face chilling challenges, explore haunted rooms, and decipher the mansion's dark secrets. Can you survive the terror and unveil the truth?

item.title: Wacky Escape
item.description: Stop trippin' and escape your destiny in this runner action game

item.title: Very Scary Backrooms Game
item.description: You have no weapons. You have no means of defending yourself. Some will chase you, some will outsmart you. If you are in danger, run and hide.

item.title: Shell's Kitchen
item.description: Dive into a fintastic culinary adventure where fish serve fish dishes to fishes, and scale new heights of seafood fun with your friends in this cooperative cooking game!

item.title: Evil Diary
item.description: Mow down hordes of monsters to survive! Survive the onslaught of a post-apocalyptic urban wasteland

item.title: The Protean Forest
item.description: The game "The Protean Forest" combines Rogue-Like card game and turn based mechanisms. Defeat demons by deploying and moving unit cards in the area and using skill cards at appropriate times. Uncovering the secret of The Protean Forest

item.title: BALL PIT KING 3D
item.description: BALL PIT KING 3D is a fun and addictive puzzle game where you drop, stack and merge quirky 3D balls with hilarious faces to create bigger ones. How big can they get? Play and see if you can become the King of the Ball Pit!

item.title: World Of Blocks
item.description: World Of Block is a sandbox game where the player has complete freedom to build their own world, using shapes, objects, and textures customized by the player.

item.title: True Reporter. Mystery of Mistwood
item.description: A free detective "Hidden object" game. Solve the crime now!

item.title: BURGLAR'S BAZAAR
item.description: "Grow your business by stealing. Sell the stolen goods in your own shop. Don't get caught by landlords. Hide, steal, and sell! Provide good service to your customers!"

item.title: On Call
item.description: On Call is a visual novel that takes you through a 3-day rotation at Merritt General Hospital. Build trust with your patients and their families to get them on the road to recovery. Manage your own stress while confronting these challenges or you may just crack under the pressure.

item.title: Dino Survivors
item.description: Face hordes of Dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures in this survival game with minimalist gameplay! Dino Survivors is a casual game with Roguelite elements, where you need to be faster and survive several species of extinct animals. Your choices will determine this.

item.title: Timberman: The Big Adventure
item.description: Enter the Timberman universe! Enjoy the retro vibe of a 2D platformer with a classic 16-bit pixel art aesthetic.
